column5: Went out today with a friend hunting down the rainbows.  Yonge_one(Will) caught 6 rainbows I caught 3 rainbows and lost 2 monsters And between the 2 of us we must have caught 25 suckers, even had a double header going with the suckers.
Those are some nice fish guys. Sucker fishing on a noodle rod is awesome, early in the season they can put up a fight!
I was just thinking about dragging myself out to that creek tomorrow morning.
LOL I guess you were not thinking to hard ADB !!!!
I forgot to put up Yonge_one's "Gun Shot"    I have more pics from yesterday, and even some "fun shots" but i dont think Everyone will get the humour in them SBB......
Nice fish!  Looks like it's time to tie some sucker spawn fly patterns
Lol...Just got back from looking for some local panfish.  My spot was actually still frozen over.
Nice fish guys.  Im heading out in the AM Sunday.

Great job on the bows, some real nice fish!  A buddy of mine was looking to target suckers. He has a family recipe for bottle sucker he was to do. Are the suckers running in most of the Lake O tribs right now? More specifically, are they running in the Durham area tribs?
Great report and pics Skeeter.  Nice Suckers LOL!!  Joey
Excellent Dann !!! And i get the humor really well. Its a great day for fishin !
nice looking fish dan
Thanks for the replies everyone. It was a fun day. Friends,fishing,and catching!!!!!!
Hey Skeeter, You can try out my sense of humour  Feel free to share via pm.
Don't let all those bows go...I need some for smoking...in return I'll send you some real Buffalo style chicken wings...
Nice fish!  Although you might get a hard time with those backgrounds
nice shootin guys
nice looking fish....
Thanks guy's !!!!  Im not worried about the back ground. First you have to figure out where we were. Then go hunt down the spot. Besides i dont mind sharing the suckers with anyone.
Sounds like a great day on the water.
